modules.description: Provides functions to parse and validate PAM (Pluggable Authentication Modules) configuration files, including reading directives and their arguments. Operates on strings and lists, extracting key-value pairs and enforcing syntax rules. Used to implement authentication logic in system login processes by interpreting PAM policy settings.

Authenticates a user by verifying a username, password, and service name against a PAM configuration. It interacts directly with the PAM system to handle authentication requests. This function is used in login systems or service access control where secure user verification is required.
